name: Crazy Appliances 疯狂电器
description:
• Smooth control, fast paced shooting experience!
  • various gameplay, watch up for the trap heroes!
  • Each boss has unique ability, they are challenging, can you defeat them?
  • Each character has exclusive skill and tailor-made weapon, choose your own style!
  • Each weapon are unique and powerful, you could also get weapon when defeat the boss!
  • Items bring more possibilities to the fight.
  • Real-time upgrading system and shop help players to upgrade their characters strategically. Remember to response wisely and carefully to different sudden occurrences!
  • Pixel arts with 8-bit music
